title: Daisy Edgar-Jones & Jacob Elordi in 'On Swift Horses' Official Trailer
description: "Your new at this, aren't you? It's all luck. We're all just a hair's breadth away from losing everything." Sony Pictures Classics has debuted an official trailer for the indie drama On Swift Horses, an enigmatic sweeping romantic proper movie set in the past in America. Not to be confused with the Apple TV series Slow Horses. Made by director Daniel Minahan, this first premiered at the 2024 Toronto Film Festival last year, and is next playing at the 2025 SXSW Film Festival coming up in March. Another chance to catch it before it opens. Muriel and her husband Lee are about to begin a bright new life in California, which is upended by the arrival of Lee's brother. Muriel embarks on a secret life of her own, gambling on racehorses and discovering a love that she never thought possible. Starring Daisy Edgar-Jones, Jacob Elordi, Will Poulter, Diego Calva, and Sasha Calle. That's an impressive powerhouse cast giving what look like are excellent, emotional performances in this. The whole dang film looks better than expected - worth a watch. Here's the first official trailer for Daniel Minahan's film On Swift Horses, direct from YouTube: Muriel (Daisy Edgar Jones) and her […]
author: Alex Billington
excerpt: "Your new at this, aren't you? It's all luck. We're all just a hair's breadth away from losing everything." Sony Pictures Classics has debuted an official trailer for the indie drama On Swift Horses, an enigmatic sweeping romantic proper movie set in the past in America. Not to be confused with the Apple TV series
text: TRAILERS by February 13, 2025Source: YouTube "Your new at this, aren't you? It's all luck. We're all just a hair's breadth away from losing everything." Sony Pictures Classics has debuted an official trailer for the indie drama On Swift Horses, an enigmatic sweeping romantic proper movie set in the past in America. Not to be confused with the Apple TV series Slow Horses. Made by director Daniel Minahan, this first premiered at the 2024 Toronto Film Festival last year, and is next playing at the 2025 SXSW Film Festival coming up in March. Another chance to catch it before it opens. Muriel and her husband Lee are about to begin a bright new life in California, which is upended by the arrival of Lee's brother. Muriel embarks on a secret life of her own, gambling on racehorses and discovering a love that she never thought possible. Starring Daisy Edgar-Jones, Jacob Elordi, Will Poulter, Diego Calva, and Sasha Calle. That's an impressive powerhouse cast giving what look like are excellent, emotional performances in this. The whole dang film looks better than expected - worth a watch. Here's the first official trailer for Daniel Minahan's film On Swift Horses, direct from YouTube: Muriel (Daisy Edgar Jones) and her husband Lee (Will Poulter) are starting a bright new life in California when he returns from the Korean War. But their newfound stability is upended by the arrival of Lee’s charismatic brother, Julius (Jacob Elordi), a wayward gambler with a secret past. A love triangle quickly forms. When Julius takes off in search of the young card cheat that he's fallen for, Muriel’s longing for something more propels her into a secret life of her own, gambling on racehorses and exploring a love she never dreamed possible. On Swift Horses is directed by American producer / filmmaker Daniel Minahan, director of Deadwood: The Movie and House Rules, and mostly other TV directing including eps of "House of Cards", "Halston" and "Fellow Travelers" most recently. The screenplay is written by Bryce Kass. Based on the novel by Shannon Pufahl. Produced by Mollye Asher, Michael D'Alto, Tim Headington, Daniel Minahan, Theresa Steele Page, Peter Spears. This first premiered at the 2024 Toronto Film Festival. Sony Classics will debut On Swift Horses in select US theaters starting April 25th, 2025 this spring. Who's in? Find more posts in: Indies, To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
February 13, 2025
Source: YouTube

"Your new at this, aren't you? It's all luck. We're all just a hair's breadth away from losing everything." Sony Pictures Classics has debuted an official trailer for the indie drama On Swift Horses, an enigmatic sweeping romantic proper movie set in the past in America. Not to be confused with the Apple TV series Slow Horses. Made by director Daniel Minahan, this first premiered at the 2024 Toronto Film Festival last year, and is next playing at the 2025 SXSW Film Festival coming up in March. Another chance to catch it before it opens. Muriel and her husband Lee are about to begin a bright new life in California, which is upended by the arrival of Lee's brother. Muriel embarks on a secret life of her own, gambling on racehorses and discovering a love that she never thought possible. Starring Daisy Edgar-Jones, Jacob Elordi, Will Poulter, Diego Calva, and Sasha Calle. That's an impressive powerhouse cast giving what look like are excellent, emotional performances in this. The whole dang film looks better than expected - worth a watch.

Here's the first official trailer for Daniel Minahan's film On Swift Horses, direct from YouTube:

Muriel (Daisy Edgar Jones) and her husband Lee (Will Poulter) are starting a bright new life in California when he returns from the Korean War. But their newfound stability is upended by the arrival of Lee’s charismatic brother, Julius (Jacob Elordi), a wayward gambler with a secret past. A love triangle quickly forms. When Julius takes off in search of the young card cheat that he's fallen for, Muriel’s longing for something more propels her into a secret life of her own, gambling on racehorses and exploring a love she never dreamed possible. On Swift Horses is directed by American producer / filmmaker Daniel Minahan, director of Deadwood: The Movie and House Rules, and mostly other TV directing including eps of "House of Cards", "Halston" and "Fellow Travelers" most recently. The screenplay is written by Bryce Kass. Based on the novel by Shannon Pufahl. Produced by Mollye Asher, Michael D'Alto, Tim Headington, Daniel Minahan, Theresa Steele Page, Peter Spears. This first premiered at the 2024 Toronto Film Festival. Sony Classics will debut On Swift Horses in select US theaters starting April 25th, 2025 this spring. Who's in?

Find more posts in: Indies, To Watch, Trailer
